1.name: The Lion King
1.description: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

2.name: The Shawshank Redemption
2.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

3.name: Pulp Fiction
3.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster & his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

4.name: Forrest Gump
4.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

5.name: Léon
5.description: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. Léon and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

6.name: The Mask
6.description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

7.name: Speed
7.description: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

8.name: Four Weddings and a Funeral
8.description: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

9.name: Natural Born Killers
9.description: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

10.name: True Lies
10.description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

11.name: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
11.description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

12.name: Dumb and Dumber
12.description: The cross-country adventures of 2 good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

13.name: Street Fighter
13.description: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

14.name: Little Women
14.description: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

15.name: The Little Rascals
15.description: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

16.name: The Crow
16.description: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

17.name: Legends of the Fall
17.description: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

18.name: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
18.description: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

19.name: Stargate
19.description: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

20.name: The Flintstones
20.description: In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy happiness.

21.name: The Client
21.description: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

22.name: Clear and Present Danger
22.description: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

23.name: The Jungle Book
23.description: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wolves, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

24.name: In the Mouth of Madness
24.description: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

25.name: Ed Wood
25.description: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams, despite his lack of talent.

26.name: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
26.description: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

27.name: D2: The Mighty Ducks
27.description: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

28.name: Reality Bites
28.description: A documentary filmmaker and her fellow Gen X graduates face life after college, looking for work and love in Houston.

29.name: Clerks
29.description: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

30.name: The Last Seduction
30.description: A devious sexpot steals her husband's drug money and hides out in a small town where she meets the perfect dupe for her next scheme.

31.name: Color of Night
31.description: A color-blind psychiatrist Bill Capa is stalked by an unknown killer after taking over his murdered friend's therapy group, all of whom have a connection to a mysterious young woman that Capa begins having intense sexual encounters with.

32.name: Disclosure
32.description: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

33.name: Only You
33.description: As a teen, Faith was told that her destiny is a man named Damon Bradley. Years later - Faith is about to marry another man - a Damon Bradley calls to wish them all the best. Faith blows off the wedding and follows Damon to Italy.

34.name: Heavenly Creatures
34.description: Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

35.name: Chung Hing sam lam
35.description: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal server at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

36.name: Frankenstein
36.description: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

37.name: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
37.description: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

38.name: Angels in the Outfield
38.description: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

39.name: Beverly Hills Cop III
39.description: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who shot his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

40.name: Wyatt Earp
40.description: The story of Wyatt Earp as he interacts and battles other famous figures of the Wild West era.

41.name: L'uomo che guarda
41.description: A troubled college professor becomes obsessed with the idea that his emotionally distant wife is having an affair with his invalid father.

42.name: The Return of the Texas Chainsaw Massacre
42.description: A group of teenagers get into a car crash in the Texas woods on prom night, and then wander into an old farmhouse that is home to Leatherface and his insane family of cannibalistic psychopaths.

43.name: Little Giants
43.description: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

44.name: Shallow Grave
44.description: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

45.name: Blown Away
45.description: An Irish bomber escapes from prison and targets a member of the Boston bomb squad.

46.name: Wes Craven's New Nightmare
46.description: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

47.name: Airheads
47.description: Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head D.J. refuses to play them.

48.name: Muriel's Wedding
48.description: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

49.name: The Pagemaster
49.description: A cowardly boy, who buries himself in accident statistics, enters a library to escape a storm, only to be transformed into an animated illustration by the Pagemaster. He has to work through obstacles from classic books to return to real-life.

50.name: The Specialist
50.description: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.
